amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 118-407 to allow an individual to invest not more than 5 percent of the net worth of the individual excluding the individual's primary residence in any one private offering. To limit the aggregate investment of the individual in private offerings to 25 percent of the net worth of the individual excluding the individual's primary residence.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to allow an individual to invest not more than 5 percent of the net worth of the individual, excluding the individual's primary residence, in any one private offering. Also, the amendment sought to limit the aggregate investment of the individual in private offerings to 25 percent of the net worth of the individual excluding the individual's primary residence.
